title: @riot lunar revel skins
body: Just checking but as the patch note imply their will be no lunar revel skins this patch? Dang I'm sad now.

replies.body: Well it makes sense considering most years the skins have been released at the end of January, so no point in putting them out in a patch this early and having them just sit there.  This way, they can make other adjustments if needed and then ship them with the proper patch at the end of Jan / start of Feb.

Hey LaoBushido, 

These skins won't be in Patch 6.1. This is intended.
It'll more than likely be in the 6.2 patch, which should be in about 2 weeks! The focus is on the start of the new season for now ;)
I agree but I just want clarification it would not be the first time the missed some skins on the patch notes but you are right for a different reason technically Chinese new year is in February
